title: Anivia's ultimate in Zhonias.
body:
While in bird form in Zhonias, Swain can still deal damage while depleting his mana (not heal up though). So why can't Anivia have this as well? She could have her ult still active while being protected. This might help her out a little.

What do you guys think?

replies.body:
>So why can't Anivia have this as well?

Anivia's Ult is considered a channel. Any hard CC will cancel it. Zonya's is considered hard CC.
Other ults function differently which is how they continue.
Swain's ult is considered a stance. Zonya's doesn't disrupt stances.
Morgana's and FIddle's ults are considered auras (or something close to). Zonya's doesn't cancel auras.
Honestly, Im pretty sure she cant just because shes an older champion. Shes relatively balanced though, so i can see the hesitance riot might have to buff her.
Better nerf Swain =D
And thanks to this thread lee sin will use kick even in the zhonia state
Zonya's disrupts cast animations. So no, he won't.
